BIO

I'm a self-taught Web Developer and i learned HTML, CSS, JS, and other tools. I got into the world of programming when I realized that with the right technical knowledge I could create and virtually innovate in any field of study. In the near future i'd like to change my field of study/work to IA and Data Sciencie if the opportunity arises I live in Buenos Aires, Argentina, and I spend most of my time gaining technical knowledge at university or doing online courses and putting my theoretical knowledge into practice
